name: Digital Geometry 2016 (DLUT)
body:
## **Digital Geometry 2016** ### **Introduction** Teacher: Junjie Cao (http://jjcao.weebly.com/) [https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=BJ0esbQAAAAJ&hl=en]
e-mail: jjcao@dlut.edu.cn; QQ: 1845687; Phone: ?
Office: B-1014, Chuangxinyuan Building of DUT
Office hours: Wed 15:30-16:30
TA: no
*** ### **Times and Places** 上课时间 | 上课地点 --------------------------| ------------- 周二 9-10节课 (1-8周) | 研教楼 409 周四 9-10节课 (1-8周) | 研教楼 409 *** ### **Syllabus** Lesson | Content --------------------------| ------------- Lesson1: Introduction | 01_01_Introduction.pptx, 01_02_Applications.pptx [see by yourself], siga15_Autoscanning for Coupled Scene Reconstruction and Proactive Object Analysis.mp4, SIGGRAPH 2015, 2014 & 2013 - Technical Papers Trailer.mp4 Lesson2: Mesh Representation [face vertex] | 02_01_Discretization representation of Surfaces with Triangulations, 02_09_Shape Representations.pptx (see by yourself) *** ## **课程PPT** > * [lect1-Raster](https://github.com/xindongzhang/CG/blob/gh-pages/_powerpoints/lect1(Raster).ppt?raw=true) > *** ## **Laboratory** > * [Lab1] mesh io and display via Matlab and libigl. * [Lab2] halfedge (optional) * ... > *** ## **Assignments** > * [Assignment1] * [Assignment2] * ... >
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
